      • getBlog

        @GET
@Path(value="/{param}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public com.mydomain.model.dto.BlogDTO getBlog(@PathParam(value="param")
                                                       java.lang.String id)
        Getting User Blog Rest URL : http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/id id - id value of blog. This is unique value created while blog is created Example url: http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0
        Parameters:
        String - id - id of the blog requested
        Returns:
        Blog that mataches the id given in JSON format
